#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define N 3000005
#define cout2(x, y) cout << x << " " << y << endl
#define INF 2000000000000000005ULL
 
using namespace std;
 
typedef unsigned long long ull;
ull P[N];
 
int main() {
 
	int tc = 0;
	scanf("%d", &tc);
	
	while(tc--){
		
		int n;
		scanf("%d", &n);
		
		ull sumXor = 0ULL;
		
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
				
			scanf("%llu", &P[i]);
			sumXor ^= P[i];
		}
		
		if(sumXor == 0ULL)puts("NO");
		else{
 
			ull ans = INF;
			int pos;
			
			for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
				
				bool menor = false, ok = true;
				ull quita = 0;
				
				for(int j = 63; j >= 0 && ok; j--){
					
					if(((sumXor>>j)&1ULL) == 0ULL)quita += ((P[i]>>j)&1ULL) * (1ULL<<j);
					else{
						
						if((P[i]>>j)&1ULL)menor = true;
						else{
							
							if(menor)quita += (1ULL<<j);
							else ok = false;
						}
					}
				}
				
				if(ok && ans >= P[i] - quita)ans = P[i] - quita;
				if(ok)pos = i + 1;
			}
			
			printf("YES %d %llu\n", pos, ans);
			
		}
		
	}
}
